title: Intimidating a juror
context: ยง710-1074 Intimidating a juror. (1) A person commits the offense of intimidating a juror if the person uses force or a threat with intent to influence a juror&rsquo;s vote, opinion, decision, or other action as a juror. (2) &ldquo;Threat&rdquo; as used in this section means any threat proscribed by section 707-764(1). (3) Intimidating a juror is a class B felony. [L 1972, c 9, pt of ยง1; am L 1980, c 267, ยง3; gen ch 1993]
